errors.message: Your token has not been granted the required scopes to execute this query. The 'email' field requires one of the following scopes: ['user:email', 'read:user'], but your token has only been granted the: ['admin:public_key', 'gist', 'project', 'read:org', 'repo'] scopes. Please modify your token's scopes at: https://github.com/settings/tokens.
